mapper.select: SELECT notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( notice_title, notice_content, notice_date ) VALUES( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW() )
